text.tspan: Annual coal consumption, measured in equivalents of terawatt-hours (TWh) per year.
Data source: Statistical Review of World Energy - BP (2022)
Note: CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States) is an organization of ten post-Soviet republics in Eurasia following break-up of the
